org.jppf.management.forwarding

Interface JPPFNodeForwardingMBean

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NotificationBroadcaster, NotificationEmitter, Serializable

    public interface JPPFNodeForwardingMBean
extends Serializable, NotificationEmitter
    MBean interface for forwarding node management requests and monitoring notfications via the driver.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String MBEAN_NAME
      Name of the driver's admin MBean.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Get the value of an attribute of the specified MBean for each specified node.

      Convenience method to invoke an MBean method that has no parameter.

    • Field Detail

      • MBEAN_NAME

        static final String MBEAN_NAME
        Name of the driver's admin MBean.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • forwardInvoke

        Map<String,Object> forwardInvoke(NodeSelector selector,
                               String name,
                               String methodName,
                               Object[] params,
                               String[] signature)
                                 throws Exception
        Invoke a method on the specified MBean of all nodes attached to the driver.
        Parameters:
        selector - a filter on the nodes attached tot he driver, determines the nodes to which this method applies.
        name - the name of the MBean.
        methodName - the name of the method to invoke.
        params - the method parameter values.
        signature - the types of the method parameters.
        Returns:
        a mapping of node uuids to the result of invoking the MBean method on the corresponding node. Each result may be an exception.
        Additionally, each result may be null, in particular if the invoked method has a void return type.
        Throws:
        Exception - if the invocation failed.

      • forwardInvoke

        Map<String,Object> forwardInvoke(NodeSelector selector,
                               String name,
                               String methodName)
                                 throws Exception
        Convenience method to invoke an MBean method that has no parameter.
        This is equivalent to calling forwardInvoke(selector, name, methodName, (Object[]) null, (String[]) null).
        Parameters:
        selector - a filter on the nodes attached to the driver, determines the nodes to which this method applies.
        name - the name of the node MBean to invoke.
        methodName - the name of the method to invoke.
        Returns:
        a mapping of node uuids to the result of invoking the MBean method on the corresponding node. Each result may be an exception.
        Additionally, each result may be null, in particular if the invoked method has a void return type.
        Throws:
        Exception - if the invocation failed.

      • forwardGetAttribute

        Map<String,Object> forwardGetAttribute(NodeSelector selector,
                                     String name,
                                     String attribute)
                                       throws Exception
        Get the value of an attribute of the specified MBean for each specified node.
        Parameters:
        selector - a filter on the nodes attached tot he driver, determines the nodes to which this method applies.
        name - the name of the MBean to invoke for each node.
        attribute - the name of the MBean attribute to read.
        Returns:
        a mapping of node uuids to the result of getting the MBean attribute on the corresponding node. Each result may be an exception.
        Throws:
        Exception - if the invocation failed.

      • forwardSetAttribute

        Map<String,Object> forwardSetAttribute(NodeSelector selector,
                                     String name,
                                     String attribute,
                                     Object value)
                                       throws Exception
        Set the value of an attribute of the specified MBean on the specified nodes attached to the driver.
        Parameters:
        selector - a filter on the nodes attached to the driver, determines the nodes to which this method applies.
        name - the name of the MBean to invoke for each node.
        attribute - the name of the MBean attribute to set.
        value - the value to set on the attribute.
        Returns:
        a mapping of node uuids to an eventual exception resulting from setting the MBean attribute on the corresponding node. This map may be empty if no exception was raised.
        Throws:
        Exception - if the invocation failed.

      • state

        Map<String,Object> state(NodeSelector selector)
                         throws Exception
        Get the latest state information from the node.
        Parameters:
        selector - a filter on the nodes attached to the driver, determines the nodes to which this method applies.
        Returns:
        a mapping of node uuids to the result of invoking the MBean method on the corresponding node. Each result may be either a JPPFNodeState object, or an exception if the invocation failed for the corresponding node.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any error occurs.

      • updateThreadPoolSize

        Map<String,Object> updateThreadPoolSize(NodeSelector selector,
                                      Integer size)
                                        throws Exception
        Set the size of the specified nodes' thread pool.
        Parameters:
        selector - a filter on the nodes attached to the driver, determines the nodes to which this method applies.
        size - the size as an int.
        Returns:
        a mapping of node uuids to an eventual exception resulting from invoking this method on the corresponding node. This map may be empty if no exception was raised.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any error occurs.

      • updateThreadsPriority

        Map<String,Object> updateThreadsPriority(NodeSelector selector,
                                       Integer newPriority)
                                         throws Exception
        Update the priority of all execution threads for the specified nodes.
        Parameters:
        selector - a filter on the nodes attached to the driver, determines the nodes to which this method applies.
        newPriority - the new priority to set.
        Returns:
        a mapping of node uuids to an eventual exception resulting from invoking this method on the corresponding node. This map may be empty if no exception was raised.
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error is raised when invoking the node mbean.

                           throws Exception

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a mapping of node uuids to an eventual exception resulting from invoking this method on the corresponding node. This map may be empty if no exception was raised.

        Exception - if any error occurs.

      • resetTaskCounter

        Map<String,Object> resetTaskCounter(NodeSelector selector)
                                    throws Exception
        Reset the specified nodes' executed tasks counter to zero.
        Parameters:
        selector - a filter on the nodes attached to the driver, determines the nodes to which this method applies.
        Returns:
        a mapping of node uuids to an eventual exception resulting from invoking this method on the corresponding node. This map may be empty if no exception was raised.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any error occurs.

      • setTaskCounter

        Map<String,Object> setTaskCounter(NodeSelector selector,
                                Integer n)
                                  throws Exception
        Reset the specified nodes' executed tasks counter to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        selector - a filter on the nodes attached to the driver, determines the nodes to which this method applies.
        n - the number to set the task counter to.
        Returns:
        a mapping of node uuids to an eventual exception resulting from invoking this method on the corresponding node. This map may be empty if no exception was raised.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any error occurs.

      • updateConfiguration

        Map<String,Object> updateConfiguration(NodeSelector selector,
                                     Map<Object,Object> config,
                                     Boolean reconnect)
                                       throws Exception
        Update the configuration properties of the specified nodes.
        Parameters:
        selector - a filter on the nodes attached to the driver, determines the nodes to which this method applies.
        config - the set of properties to update.
        reconnect - specifies whether the node should reconnect ot the driver after updating the properties.
        Returns:
        a mapping of node uuids to an eventual exception resulting from invoking this method on the corresponding node. This map may be empty if no exception was raised.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any error occurs.

      • cancelJob

        Map<String,Object> cancelJob(NodeSelector selector,
                           String jobId,
                           Boolean requeue)
                             throws Exception
        Cancel the job with the specified id in the specified nodes.
        Parameters:
        selector - a filter on the nodes attached to the driver, determines the nodes to which this method applies.
        jobId - the id of the job to cancel.
        requeue - true if the job should be requeued on the server side, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        a mapping of node uuids to an eventual exception resulting invoking this method on the corresponding node. This map may be empty if no exception was raised.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any error occurs.

      • getDelegationModel

        Map<String,Object> getDelegationModel(NodeSelector selector)
                                      throws Exception
        Get the current class loader delegation model for the specified nodes.
        Parameters:
        selector - a filter on the nodes attached to the driver, determines the nodes to which this method applies.
        Returns:
        a mapping of node uuids to the result of invoking the MBean method on the corresponding node. Each result may be either a DelegationModel enum value, or an exception if the invocation failed for the corresponding node.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any error occurs.
        See Also:
        AbstractJPPFClassLoader.getDelegationModel()

      • setDelegationModel

        Map<String,Object> setDelegationModel(NodeSelector selector,
                                    DelegationModel model)
                                      throws Exception
        Set the current class loader delegation model for the specified nodes.
        Parameters:
        selector - a filter on the nodes attached to the driver, determines the nodes to which this method applies.
        model - either either PARENT_FIRST or URL_FIRST. If any other value is specified then this method has no effect.
        Returns:
        a mapping of node uuids to an eventual exception resulting from invoking this method on the corresponding node. This map may be empty if no exception was raised.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any error occurs.
        See Also:
        AbstractJPPFClassLoader.setDelegationModel(org.jppf.classloader.DelegationModel)

        Returns:

        Exception - if any error occurs.
